titles.title: Restoration of the U.S.-Russia Polar Bear Conservation Fund Act of 2008
To amend the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972 to allow the importation of polar bear trophies taken in sport hunts in Canada.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, and Oceans.

bill.summary: 9/26/2008--Introduced. Restoration of the U.S.-Russia Polar Bear Conservation Fund Act of 2008 - Amends the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972 to allow importation of polar bear parts (other than internal organs) taken legally by the importation applicant in sport hunts in Canada.
